title: House

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Anyone you abduct will not be able to act the following night. They will not know this, and only be told they were roleblocked (or roleblocked through immunity if they are roleblock immune.)

> You take priority over all Jailor-like roles.

> You will gain 1 random ability from the player you abduct. You may use the ability, or discard it permanently to deal a powerful attack to a player and a basic attack to their visitors.

> Anyone who tries to visit an abducted target will be told their target isn't home.

> Anyone who tries to target you will be told their target isn't home. (they aren't expecting you to be a house so they assume you aren't home.)

> You may use 2 abilities per night.

> If all other kill capable roles are dead, you will be told this, and may deal a powerful attack to a player and a basic attack to all their visitors every night.

> You are conversion immune because a house cannot be convinced to become loyal to a faction/player.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 1165
*"Why is there a house walking towards us?"*
*"I'm Sheriff but with Basic Attack."*
*"Oh okay I believe you talking house, I'll protect you tonight."*
